Sidekick is an agentic CLI developer tool that allows users to enhance their command-line workflows with AI. It offers features like LLM provider flexibility, MCP support, and per-project customization, aiming to provide an open-source alternative to similar tools while maintaining an agentic workflow.

WebLook is a command-line tool designed for capturing screenshots and recordings of web pages. It offers features such as configurable wait times, viewport sizes, JavaScript execution, and browser console log capture. The tool is intended to support local development workflows by providing a simple way to capture visual states of web applications.

Shellfirm intercepts potentially dangerous shell commands and prompts users with a verification challenge, acting as a 'captcha for your terminal'. It helps prevent accidental data loss or system damage by requiring users to confirm risky actions. The tool supports customizable patterns and integrates with Zsh and Bash.

ğŸ“ ğ—”ğ—•ğ—¢ğ—¨ğ—§ ğ—§ğ—›ğ—œğ—¦ ğ—£ğ—¥ğ—¢ğ—ğ—˜ğ—–ğ—§

KrbRelayEx is a C# tool designed for Kerberos relay attacks, enabling Man-in-the-Middle exploitation by manipulating DNS entries. It relays Kerberos AP-REQ tickets to access SMB shares or HTTP ADCS endpoints, offering features like multithreaded SMB consoles and port forwarding. The tool is cross-platform compatible and intended for legitimate security testing and research.

ğŸ“ ğ—”ğ—•ğ—¢ğ—¨ğ—§ ğ—§ğ—›ğ—œğ—¦ ğ—£ğ—¥ğ—¢ğ—ğ—˜ğ—–ğ—§

Ballcat is a rapid development scaffolding that enables developers to quickly build enterprise-level backend management systems. It provides pre-built starters for extending functionality and includes features such as user separation, menu/data permissions, logging, exception handling, and security measures like XSS and SQL injection prevention. The project aims to simplify and accelerate the development process for enterprise applications.

Peergos is a decentralized platform focused on providing users with complete control over their data and online interactions. It achieves this through a peer-to-peer encrypted filesystem with fine-grained access control, a secure messenger, encrypted email, and a private social network. The platform aims to create a private web where users own their data and decide who can access it.
